BBEX3.A.UZS.EUR.CA.AC.A04: Exchange rates for the euro in Uzbekistan / EUR 1 = UZS ... (middle)
Source: Central Bank of the Republic of Uzbekistan, Tashkent.
Methodology: Until 2000, calculated on the basis of month-end rates, and from 2001 on the basis of mid-month and month-end rates.

Comment on 2001: On 1 November 2001, the exchange rates were adjusted sharply. We recorded the following rates.  31 October 2001: EUR 1 = UZS 387.81  1 November 2001: EUR 1 = UZS 617.78  Calculated devaluation: 37.2%.
